oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Conversion farm case studies
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Grey, Peter
Holt, Georgina
Tranter, Richard
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Policy environments and social economy
"Organics" in general
Farm economics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This report was presented at the UK Organic Research 2002 Conference. The poster presents some preliminary findings of work in progress on case studies of farmers interested in conversion. This work is part of the EU-funded project ‘Barriers to conversion to organic farming-QLRT-1999- 31112’.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Organic Centre Wales, Institute of Rural Studies, University of Wales Aberystwyth
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Grey, Peter; Holt, Georgina and Tranter, Richard (2002) Conversion farm case studies. In: Powell, Jane and et al., (Eds.) Proceedings of the UK Organic Research 2002 Conference, Organic Centre Wales, Institute of Rural Studies, University of Wales Aberystwyth, pp. 327-328.
